FuncDef: The pki import sm2-key-pair command imports an SM2 key pair into the memory.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an SM2 key pair.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Specifies the name of a DER private key file.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Specifies the name of a PEM private key file.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Specifies the password of a PEM private key file.
The new password is at least eight characters long and contains at least two of the following types: upper-case letters, lower-case letters, digits, and special characters.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters that can be letters or digits. The password can be a string of 1 to 31 characters in plain text or a string of 20 to 432 characters in encrypted text.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] pki import sm2-key-pair keypair1 der keyfile1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The SM2 key pair obtained using the offline mode can take effect only after being imported to the memory.
The size of the SM2 certificate cannot be greater than 2 MB. Otherwise, the certificate fails to be imported.
Updating the key every 90 days is recommended.
